# backsideImage

**Instance Property**

The image that appears on the back of the source image as the page curls to reveal the target image.

## Declaration

```swift
var backsideImage: CIImage? { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **angle**: The angle of the curling page.
- **extent**: The extent of the effect.
- **radius**: The radius of the curl.
- **shadingImage**: An image that looks like a shaded sphere enclosed in a square.

items.description: The angle of the curling page.
